file_content.text: The Gormak have spat on our heritage for the last time!
I've got a lot of catching up to do. Excuse me.
You're back. And you have the relics? Can I--carefully, now.
Hmm... nothing appears to be broken, though a thorough detox may be in order.
You've done fine work. The legacies of the ancient Sith are back in Sith hands.
The Gormak still have control of the excavation site.
What about the ruins?
Regrettable, but we'll drive them out in due time. We have what's important.
That means I'm done.
Yes, yes, mission fulfilled, or however that goes.
Big deal.
You mustn't underestimate the importance of knowledge.
Oh, I can hardly wait to start analyzing these beauties. Such secrets they must hold....
Please do hurry. The Gormak mustn't handle those artifacts a minute longer.
You there, hunter. I hear you've a knack for extermination.
Agent. You're just in time to deal with some trespassers.
The natives have gone too far this time!
You've seen the Sith ruins, yes? Remarkable find, incredibly well-preserved. But they're crawling with Gormak.
Filthy brutes overran our excavation site. They're looting everything!
Then quit sniveling and prepare a counterattack.
Fight back!
How? The Gormak already butchered our security detail.
The Gormak aren't fit to handle the relics of the Sith.
How dare they!
Infuriating, yes? Just the thought of them defiling such treasures--!
The Gormak would already be in the ground if they'd stolen from me.
And you're just gonna take it?
I don't--ah! Yes, in the ground. A fitting end for tomb robbers.
Could these artifacts somehow be used against us?
Anything dangerous stolen?
Their value is strictly academic. They'd be little more than trinkets and trophies to the Gormak.
Settle down.
Those savages are desecrating the archaeological find of the century. Now is not the time for calm.
Like I care what happens to a few antiques.
Big deal.
Those "antiques" are the key to unlocking the secrets of the ancient Sith.
The Gormak steered clear of the ruins until their leader grew a spine and ordered the tombs ransacked.
We'd have sent them packing if not for their pets. Vile things--more machine than beast. Turned the dig site into a feeding ground.
Raiding an excavation site doesn't make sense. Nothing of value for the Gormak there.
Why would they attack?
They're just beating their chests, trying to assert their power.
I'm not scared.
Oh? Volunteering then, are we?
Can't you just move your operation elsewhere?
Then dig somewhere else.
The rubbish out here is scarcely worth cataloging.
Please, the artifacts from those tombs contain centuries' worth of knowledge--knowledge that could be lost forever.
We must recover whatever relics the Gormak have plundered before those brutes do something stupid--like swallow them.
The contents of those ruins belong to the Emperor. The Gormak shall not have them.
For the Empire.
I knew you wouldn't let this go unanswered.
The legacies of the ancient Sith are for our eyes only.
We must protect our heritage.
So glad you agree.
I'm a bounty hunter, not a treasure hunter. If I do this, it'll cost you.
You willing to pay for them?
Yes, yes, whatever you want.
This attack could set a precedent if unanswered. The Gormak must be taught their place.
I'm on the job.
A harsh but necessary lesson.
Where are they?
Excellent. The ruins aren't far.
We need the artifacts in one piece. The Gormak are a different story.
Do it yourself. [Refuse quest]
What am I going to do? Note-take them to death?
Tread carefully. The secrets of the Sith lie beneath your feet.
